q: A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. Delivering applications anywhere, anytime with maximum security and control over data QlikView Customers Outperform the Best-in-Class with Dashboards Exponential data growth is emerging as arguably the biggest issue IT managers face. Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so," David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.-- Editors: Eddie Buckle, Anthony Aarons.
